content:
238 
 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
COMMUNICATION ARTS  
BOWEN  
UYO          
  
COMMUNICATION AND  
LANGUAGE ARTS  
 IBADAN        
  
COMMUNICATION STUDIES  
CIWA  
  
  
Two ‘A’ level passes or 
equivalent in Arts or 
Social Science subjects.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes 
or equivalent including 
English  Language,  
Literature-in-English, Arts/ 
Music depending on the 
combination.  
  
Any  three (3)Arts 
or   Social Science 
subjects.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i)  IBADAN  accepts  ND  upper  credit  Mass  
Communication plus 'O' level credit pass in 
Literature in English;accepts two (2) ‘A’ level 
passes to include Literature in English and one (1) 
other Arts or Social Science subject.  
  
UTME  
(i) BOWEN requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to 
include English Language, Literature in English 
and any other three (3) Arts or Social Science 
subjects.  
(ii) IBADAN requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes at  
one (1) sitting or six (6) 'O' level credit passes at 
two (2) sittings to include English Language,  
Literature in English and any other three (3) or 
four (4) subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or 
Sciences. Note that Government and Economics 
are not Arts subjects.  
(iii) UYO accepts a D7 in Mathematics.  
  
UTME  SUBJECTS  
(i) BOWEN and IGBINEDION accept any other 
subjects in addition to LiteratureinEnglish.  
(ii) UYO - Music/Literature inEnglish/Fine Arts and any 
two (2) Arts or Social Science subjects.
